DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Japan . The purpose trial investigate safety effect biphasic insulin aspart 50 compare biphasic human insulin 50 patient type 2 diabetes mellitus .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Effect Biphasic Insulin Aspart 50 Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus .
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec , insulin aspart drug combination
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes mellitus Current treatment premixed human insulin preparation biphasic/premixed insulin analogue twice daily treatment least 8 week . HbA1C : le 11.0 % BMI : less 30.0 kg/m2 Total daily insulin dose : 100 IU/U Treatment oral hypoglycaemic agent within last 4 week . Treatment insulin sensitizer within last 12 week A lifestyle consider unsuitable trial ( frequent routine night shift worker etc . )
